ygData.subject: Charisma and song effectiveness
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, Sorry if this has been hashed over before, but I m wondering if anyone could share their experiences or knowledge on what effect charisma has on bard
ygData.messageBody:
Hi,

Sorry if this has been hashed over before, but I'm wondering if anyone
could share their experiences or knowledge on what effect charisma has on
bard songs. I've left my charisma at base (85) when I created my
character, however now that star rubies are purchasable, I have an
opportunity to get +7 dex +5 charisma rings. I know the dex will
definitely be useful, but does the charisma have any effect besides
buying/selling? Perhaps less resists? Longer charms?

I know a lot of the info on charisma is probably just speculation since
it's so hard to measure, but I'm still curious to hear what people have to
say on it.

Thanks,

---
Jesse <j@...>
http://www.lumiere.net/
